subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Jim Zorn has taken the sizable step from being the quarterbacks coach of the Seattle Seahawks to head coach of the Washington Redskins over the course of the last few months.
snippet: Jim Zorn has taken the sizable step from being the quarterbacks coach of the Seattle Seahawks to head coach of the Washington Redskins over the course of the last few months.
